Package cp213

Class RTModel

java.lang.Object
cp213.RTModel
public class RTModel
extends java.lang.Object
The right triangle model. Allows users to update the base and height separately.
Version:
2017-06-19
Author:
David Brown from Byron Weber-Becker

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String BASE_CHANGE
    Used to signal a change in the base value property of the model.
    static java.lang.String HEIGHT_CHANGE
    Used to signal a change in the height value property of the model.
    static double MAX_SIDE
    The maximum size of each of the two non-hypotenuse sides of the triangle.
